com.vub.service

Class CourseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vub.service.CourseService

  • public class CourseService
extends java.lang.Object

    Service for the Course class. This class provides all of the business logic, which includes:

    • Standard CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update and Delete)
    • Listing all the courses in the database

    • Method Detail

      • createCourse

        public Course createCourse(Course course)
        Create a new course in the database
        Parameters:
        course - The course object to store in the database
        Returns:
        Returns the Course object. Note that its fields may have been modified as a result of saving it to the database (e.g. primary key may now exist)

      • updateCourse

        public Course updateCourse(Course course)
        Parameters:
        course - Updates the given course in the database

      • findCourseById

        public Course findCourseById(int id)
                      throws CourseNotFoundException
        Find a Course object in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Course which needs to be fetched
        Returns:
        A Course object fetched from the database
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - When the Course with the given ID could not be found in the database

                                 throws CourseNotFoundException

        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Course which needs to be fetched
        Returns:
        A Course object fetched from the database
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - When the Course with the given ID could not be found in the database
